abstracts.cdata!:
The development objective of the Water
            Private Sector Contracts OBA for Coverage Expansion Project
            is to assist low income households with subsidized yard
            connections to the water distribution network in Maputo and
            four secondary cities (the northern cities of Beira,
            Quelimane, Nampula and Pemba). The re-structured grant will
            re-allocate the existing funds from the four northern cities
            to Maputo. Poor households who cannot afford to pay
            connection costs are currently excluded from the water
            network. The purpose of this paper is to restructuring of
            grant agreement no.TF091213 by modifying the development
            objectives, revising the components, reallocating the grant
            proceeds between components, cancelling US$1.0 million, and
            extending the closing date of the grant from December 31,
            2011 to June 30, 2014.
